title: Crash when trying to change waypoint name

labels.name: Unverified
labels.description: Issue not yet confirmed/reproduced or feature requests not yet checked for plausibility

body:
### Describe your problem!

A user has the reproducable problem, that c:geo crashes when trying to change the name of a "Go to" target. Not sure if changing a waypoint name in a "normal cache" has the same problem.

In a first try I was unable to reproduce it, maybe some other precondition or depending on Android version.


### How to reproduce?

- User creates new ZZ0 waypoint by triggering c:geo from the ALC app
- User long taps on that waypoint in ZZ0 and selects "Edit"
- Waypoint edit dialog is shown and users taps on the waypoint name field

See also video from user:

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/949669/149926381-a3e1a38a-15c8-4f84-b583-672644c1392d.mp4




### Actual result after these steps?

- Crash

```
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: FATAL EXCEPTION: main
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: Process: cgeo.geocaching, PID: 30862
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void android.view.View.getBoundsOnScreen(android.graphics.Rect)' on a null object reference
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.assist.AssistStructure$WindowNode.<init>(AssistStructure.java:484)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.assist.AssistStructure.<init>(AssistStructure.java:1908)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.ActivityThread.handleRequestAssistContextExtras(ActivityThread.java:3580)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.ActivityThread$H.handleMessage(ActivityThread.java:2238)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.os.Handler.dispatchMessage(Handler.java:108)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.os.Looper.loop(Looper.java:166)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at android.app.ActivityThread.main(ActivityThread.java:7529)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at com.android.internal.os.Zygote$MethodAndArgsCaller.run(Zygote.java:245)
01-18 11:42:13.202 30862 30862 E AndroidRuntime: 	at com.android.internal.os.ZygoteInit.main(ZygoteInit.java:921)
```

### Expected result after these steps?

Normal operation, no crash

### Reproducible

Unclear

### c:geo Version

2021.12.24
